pages.text:
Events
Industry Appreciation Day
Monday September 1st
Every Monday
We appreciate the hospitality world and know how hard you all work. Join us for BOGO drinks every Monday.
Show your ID or tell a CueBru Crew Member where you work and get BOGO beers all day.
03:00 PM - 09:00 PM
Books & Brews
Tuesday September 2nd
Monthly on every first Tuesday
Cueni Brewing Co. hosts a book club for individuals who love to read and want to discuss the books they've read while enjoying a beer or two. The format is simple: each month, a volunteer leads the discussion.
To be a leader, you must have read the book, be willing to pose questions, and lead the discussion.
Everyone is welcome, even if you haven’t finished the book; we want you to join us. We meet the first Tuesday of the month from 7:00 - 8:00 pm.
2025 Schedule
September 2nd  The London Seance Society by Sarah Penner
October 7th  The Getaway Girls by Dee MacDonald
November 4th   Cinder by Marissa Meyer
December 2nd  Small Things Like These by Claire Keegan
Talk to Bren Cueni if you have any questions or would like
more information, or join our Facebook Group
07:00 PM - 08:00 PM
Beer & the Bible
Thursday September 4th
Every Thursday
Are you interested in discussing faith and spirituality? Do you want a safe space to ask questions? Join us every Thursday for Beer & The Bible.
You do not need to come every week to enjoy the study. If you have any questions, call or message Bren Cueni.
06:45 PM - 08:00 PM
Dunedin Run Club
Thursday September 4th
Every Thursday
Dunedin Runs Has a New Home Base!
Dunedin Run's new home is  Cueni Brewing Co.—still 7 PM, same Thursday energy, just a seriously upgraded hangout spot.
Why Cueni? Award-winning craft beer that’s brewed right on site. A gorgeous patio that’s perfect for post-run hangs and catching the sunset. A fantastic indoor bar with a chill, community vibe. Direct access to the Pinellas Trail—so your run starts and ends right where the good stuff is.
We will have icy cold water available for you, as well as bar snacks for purchase, after your run.
When: Thursdays at 7 PM
Where: Cueni Brewing Co., 945 Huntley Ave
Why: Top-tier beer, trail access, and YOU. Let’s break in the new spot the best way we know how—together. See you there!
07:00 PM - 09:00 PM
Cheese & Beer Pairing
Wednesday September 10th
Join us for Beer & Cheese Pairing Night with Becca's Muncheese! Meet Becca; with more than 16 years of experience in the cheese industry, Becca's passion for all things local is bound to elevate your taste experience. Becca's dedication to her craft is evident - she achieved certification by the American Cheese Society as a Certified Cheese Professional in 2014. Her expertise shines as she expertly matches the finest cheeses with our exceptional brews.
The Cheese and beer pairing is $30, including four beer tasters paired with four cheeses. CBC Head Brewer Jon Cueni will discuss the beer, while Becca, the cheese expert, will share about the cheese.  Seating is limited to 20 tickets, so don't delay. The link to purchase tickets for pairing is
https://bit.ly/CueBruStore
. Make sure to choose the month you would like to attend
07:00 PM - 08:00 PM
Boozy Banned Book Club
Wednesday September 17th
Monthly on every third Wednesday
We meet on the 3rd Wednesday of each month from 7:00 pm to discuss a book that has been banned at some point in time. Although it is not currently prohibited in Florida, it is on a list of banned books.
The purpose of the club is to discuss books that might be considered controversial and engage in open dialogue about the book and the factors that may have led to those decisions.
Schedule:
September 17:  The Perks of Being A Wallflower by Stephen Chbosky
October 15:  TBD
November 19:  Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil by       John Berendt
December 17:  Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone by J.K. Rowling
If you have any questions, reach out to Bren Cueni or join our Facebook group
07:00 PM - 08:00 PM
Bundts & Brews
Thursday September 18th
Forget everything you think you know about dessert and drinks. Prepare your taste buds for an explosion of flavor, as we pair the irresistible charm of mini bundt cakes (bundtinis!) with the craft beer magic of CueBru! Yes, it sounds delightfully unusual, and trust us, it's insanely delicious.  Imagine sinking your teeth into moist, decadent bundtinis, each bite perfectly complemented by a carefully selected 5 oz. taster of CueBru's finest brews. It's a symphony of sweet and hoppy, a culinary adventure you won't soon forget.  For just $20, you'll indulge in four delectable bundtinis and four perfectly paired 5 oz. CueBru tasters. Whether you're a seasoned foodie or just looking for a fun night out, this is an experience you won't want to miss.
Tickets are vanishing faster than you can say "bundt cake and beer," so grab yours now before they're all gone! Don't miss out on this unique and delicious event – get your tickets today! Order online at
http://bit.ly/CueBruStore
or come in during business hours
07:00 PM - 08:00 PM
Salty, Sweet, and Brews - Popcorn and Beer Pairing with Signature Popcorn
Wednesday September 24th
Join us for a tasty evening as we team up with our friends at Signature Popcorn for an exciting popcorn and beer pairing event! Imagine the perfect harmony of flavors as we pair four of our finest CueBrus with four irresistible flavors of Signature Popcorn.  Our Head Brewer, Jon, will take you on a sensory journey, sharing the stories behind each beer and revealing the unique characteristics that make them shine. Meanwhile, Eric, the mastermind behind Signature Popcorn, will delight you with insights into how his delectable popcorn pairs perfectly with our brews.  Get ready to indulge in a night of tasty treats, fascinating insights, and a great atmosphere. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to elevate your taste buds and enjoy the perfect blend of craft beer and gourmet popcorn!  Tickets are only $20 & include 4 tasters of CueBru and 4 small portions of popcorn. Go to
https://bit.ly/CueBruStore
to get your tickets today.
07:00 PM - 08:00 PM
National Drink Beer Day
Sunday September 28th
Join us for National Drink Beer Day on Sept 28th and try one of our many craft brews!
11:00 AM - 08:00 PM
National Coffee Day
Monday September 29th
Sit back, relax and enjoy a coffee for National Coffee Day September 29th!
11:00 AM - 09:00 PM
Bundts & Brews
Wednesday October 8th
Forget everything you think you know about dessert and drinks. http://bit.ly/CueBruStore
or come in during business hours
07:00 PM - 08:00 PM
National Dessert Day
Tuesday October 14th
Indulge in dinner and a dessert on National Dessert Day!
11:00 AM - 09:00 PM
Pint for Pint - Cueni Brewing Co. Blood Drive
Thursday October 16th
Donate a pint of blood to get a pint of beer but more importantly, the satisfaction of saving someone's life.  Please note that we are
NOT
holding the event at the brewery due to our landlord's restrictions but at
Ocean Optics parking lot on Douglas across from Casa Tina's.
Click here to make an appointment -
https://oneblood.org/donate-now
02:00 PM - 07:00 PM
Halloween Painting Party with Heather's Traveling Canvas
Monday October 20th
Let’s Paint Spooky Join Heather’s Traveling Canvas & Cueni Brewing Co. for a Halloween-themed Painting Party on Monday, October 20th at 7:00 PM at Cueni Brewing Co.!   No stress, just fun! Here’s what’s included:   - All Painting Supplies Provided — Canvas, brushes, paints & more!  - Full Setup & Cleanup — Just show up, we’ll handle the rest!  - Relaxing, No-Experience-Needed — We’ll guide you step-by-step!  - Fun & Chill Atmosphere — Perfect for a girls’ night, date, or solo unwind.
**$39 per person**  Spots are filling up fast! Click the link to grab yours now: Order online at http://bit.ly/CueBruStore or come in during business hours
Let’s paint Halloween together!
07:00 PM - 09:00 PM
Salty, Sweet, and Brews - Popcorn and Beer Pairing with Signature Popcorn
Wednesday October 22nd
Join us for a tasty evening as we team up with our friends at Signature Popcorn for an exciting popcorn and beer pairing event! Imagine the perfect harmony of flavors as we pair four of our finest CueBrus with four irresistible flavors of Signature Popcorn. Meanwhile, Eric, the mastermind behind Signature Popcorn, will delight you with insights into how his delectable popcorn pairs perfectly with our brews.  Get ready to indulge in a night of tasty treats, fascinating insights, and a great atmosphere. Don’t miss out on this opportunity to elevate your taste buds and enjoy the perfect blend of craft beer and gourmet popcorn!  Tickets are only $20 & include 4 tasters of CueBru and 4 small portions of popcorn. Go to
https://bit.ly/CueBruStore
to get your tickets today.
07:00 PM - 08:00 PM
National Chocolate Day
Tuesday October 28th
Because life is better with chocolate!
11:00 AM - 09:00 PM

07:00 PM - 08:00 PM
Halloween
Friday October 31st
Bring your best costume and join us on Halloween!
11:00 AM - 11:00 PM
Thanksgiving
Thursday November 27th
Bring your friends and family by on Thanksgiving Day for a celebratory feast!
11:00 AM - 09:00 PM

Cheese & Beer Pairing
Wednesday October 29th
Join us for Beer & Cheese Pairing Night with Becca's Muncheese! Meet Becca; with more than 16 years of experience in the cheese industry, Becca's passion for all things local is bound to elevate your taste experience. Becca's dedication to her craft is evident - she achieved certification by the American Cheese Society as a Certified Cheese Professional in 2014. Her expertise shines as she expertly matches the finest cheeses with our exceptional brews.
The Cheese and beer pairing is $30, including four beer tasters paired with four cheeses. CBC Head Brewer Jon Cueni will discuss the beer, while Becca, the cheese expert, will share about the cheese.  Seating is limited to 20 tickets, so don't delay. The link to purchase tickets for pairing is
https://bit.ly/CueBruStore
. Make sure to choose the month you would like to attend
